Name: case-management
Title: Case Management | AidIQ.com
Body:
Case Management

Beneficiary Registry

A case is recorded for the individual and their family members, where appropriate.

Processing Workflows

Workflows can be defined on how cases should be processed...setting up interviews as-required.

Needs Assessment and Eligibility Screening

Cases can be assessed for Eligibility and to determine Needs.

Direct Assistance and Support Brokering

Assistance can be provided by the Case Manager and managed using Activities or else they can refer the case to external partners.

Case Studies

  • Support to Life: Syrian Refugees in Turkey
  • Refuscope. German Red Cross (DRK)
